Cody's Tribute to Edison
It is a great pleasure to see this wonder working man at his task and to find that though he is super man to all the world, he is very human at home and among those who labor with him.
He has made the dynamo that has changed the world. It seems almost uncanny that the voice in this place can be perpetuated and that he has set out to the world his phonograph, which have given more entertainment and pleasure than any invention in the history of the world.
Courtesy of the G. Robert Vincent Voice Library of the Michigan State University Libraries.
